post.body: & @karimullen words can't express the awesomeness of the gift... So here's a pic! http://twitpic.com/x4og
it's a good thing you're not projecting that image all over a sermon or website or something
you have got to be kidding me. best of luck to you and your sanity. I think costco sells advil.
probably with a lot of therapy.
and who might that be?
I understand completely... mark, more than anybody, needs to be there.
R.I.P. indeed. 5 years for free isn't too shabby. plans are in the works for how to give it a proper farewell.
feels like a short week again... maybe it's just cuz Jaimee decided to be born 2 days before new year's... crazy girl.
way to go texans, you might just yet offer a young generation of houston football fans a few favorable nostalgic memories.
Kick A lace-job on new pair of shoes is complete http://twitpic.com/x6c1
Taking on the galleria... Getting some exercise in the process no doubt
cracking up at the holiday mailbag from the Sports Guy... epic.
Trying to decide if you could pay me to wear a "sticky and sweet" tour t-shirt.
Skip-bo with people who have never played before... Merry Christmas confusion. This game is ridiculous when you think about it.
Jaimee knows me well and got me cool stuff. Merry Christmas!
currently thankful for the goodness that is the de-wrinkle cycle on the dryer. just saved me hours (prob. just 2, but still) of ironing.
i'll just come out and say it... i love me some 70* Christmas weather.
just a little bit more working and then... BAM... christmas.
Ridiculous bumper sticker of the year: "feel the passion... Figure skate!"
The beast is dead. we all knew this day would come... @markretzloff will understand
